title: Mayfield to Panthers, 2nd year expectations, Cowboys elite? NFC North Checklist, and The Superstar Club
itunes:title: Mayfield to Panthers, 2nd year expectations, Cowboys elite? NFC North Checklist, and The Superstar Club
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast returns with Baker Mayfield being traded to the Panthers. Hosts Rachel Bonnetta, Tom Pelissero, Adam Rank, and Fmr NFL DB Darius Butler debate how much of an upgrade the move is for Carolina.  Tom explains his high expectations of Trevor Lawrence in his 2nd season, while Rachel will be watching Zach Wilson.  We look at the Cowboys and how close they are to being an elite team.  The table puts together a checklist of needs for the NFC North before taking a closer look at The Superstar Club list from Dan Hanzus. Adam wraps up with his 'State of the Franchise' for the Kansas City Chiefs.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
